comment.author: 34063259@N07
comment._content:
Hi Andy--This is Jay Yellowhorse Laughlin's daughter here.  
I can't believe it will be 5 years ago that Dad passed to the other side, but I have thought of you often.  
I miss my Dad sooo much.  Hope this finds you well.
Caroll

comment.author: 42718604@N00
comment._content:
WOW!!!
Andy was my boss, he is retired now, I can't believe I have found a picture of my boss when he was a little kid! My boss Andy is a good person, here I can see his parents. I remember sometimes he told me some old time stories -the want I really enjoyed- about how they live back in the days on the Everglades!
